column4: yeah yeah Linksys blah blah, wasn't available when I bought this.
anyone who don't want theirs can send it here  =D

I'm a student though, and I have this technology addiction
so I am both poor and always buying expensive toys, etc
actually, the G5 is not mine yet, technically.
it is technically owned by the state of Oregon
but it has this nice LCD on it (20" picture frame model)
hi, haven't seen you in a while :)
don't let them install RAM.  Good grief, just don't EVEN ...
I have been an exclusively Mac user for about two years
School.  Requires MS Word, like everywhere else.
